description:
Universe 6’s Hit and Universe 11’s Dyspo clash at breakneck speed. Even Hit’s signature Time Skip is too slow to be effective against Dyspo! But when a second Pride Trooper intervenes on his teammate’s behalf, Goku arrives to tip the scales.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chouzetsu Kousoku Battle Boppatsu! Gokuu to Hit no Kyoudou Sensen!!
Ein Kampf in Überlichtgeschwindigkeit! – Goku und Hit an gemeinsamer Front!
The Ultimate High Speed Battle Begins! Goku and Hit Join Forces!!
超絶光速バトル勃発! 悟空とヒットの共同戦線!!
